text:
Determining slope of zero from a table

Determining Slope \begin{tabular}{|c|c|}\n\hline[imath] x [/imath] & [imath] y [/imath] \\\n\hline-2 & [imath] -\frac{1}{4} [/imath] \\\n\hline-1 & [imath] -\frac{1}{4} [/imath] \\\n\hline 0 & [imath] -\frac{1}{4} [/imath] \\\n\hline 1 & [imath] -\frac{1}{4} [/imath] \\\n\hline 2 & [imath] -\frac{1}{4} [/imath] \\\n\hline\n\end{tabular}
